tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_actions (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 player_id INT,
 action_type VARCHAR(255),
 action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 decision VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerDecisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    decision_time TIMESTAMP,
    decision_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES PlayerActions(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    decision_id INT,
    experience_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES actions(action_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (decision_id) REFERENCES decisions(decision_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    decision_type VARCHAR(255),
    decision_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    decision_details JSON
);
